description: Diamonds is a simple, yet highly polished 3-match puzzle game, The aim of the game is to make alignment of 3 or more diamonds, both vertically or horizontally by swapping adjacent diamonds. It has beautiful graphics and euphonious music, and there are 2 play modes of this game. In normal mode, this game ends when there are no possible moves left. In timer mode, it ends when there are no moves or time left.
